TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate LocalCertificateSelectionCallback(object sender, string targetHost, X509CertificateCollection localCertificates, X509Certificate remoteCertificate, string[] acceptableIssuers);
.class public auto ansi sealed LocalCertificateSelectionCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function LocalCertificateSelectionCallback(sender As Object, targetHost As String, localCertificates As X509CertificateCollection, remoteCertificate As X509Certificate, acceptableIssuers As String()) As X509Certificate

public delegate System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate ^ LocalCertificateSelectionCallback(System::Object ^ sender, System::String ^ targetHost, X509CertificateCollection ^ localCertificates, X509Certificate ^ remoteCertificate, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ acceptableIssuers);

param.name: sender
param.span: 一个对象，它包含此验证的状态信息。

span.span: An object that contains state information for this validation.

param.name: targetHost
param.span: 客户端指定的主机服务器。

span.span: The host server specified by the client.

param.name: remoteCertificate
param.span: 用于对远程方进行身份验证的证书。

span.span: The certificate used to authenticate the remote party.

param.name: acceptableIssuers
param.span: 远程方可接受的证书颁发者的 数组。

span.span: A array of certificate issuers acceptable to the remote party.

summary.span: 选择用于身份验证的本地安全套接字层 (SSL) 证书。

span.span: Selects the local Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate used for authentication.

returns.span: 用于建立 SSL 连接。

span.span: An used for establishing an SSL connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托用于构造的实例类。This delegate is used to construct instances of the class. 类用于帮助客户端和服务器之间交换的安全信息。The class is used to help secure information exchanged between a client and server. 客户端和服务器使用此委托来选择要用于身份验证的证书。The client and server use this delegate to select a certificate to be used for authentication. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示此委托的一个方法实现。The following code example demonstrates a method implementation for this delegate.
